name: Banco Primus, S.A.
headAddress: Rua Quinta do Quintã, n.º4, Edifício D.João I, 1.º A
boss: Hugo Miguel Soares Carvalho da Silva
goal:
Banco Primus is a fully licensed Portuguese bank, with two foreign branches located in Spain and Hungary, specialized in mortgage and consumer lending, well established, profitable and currently a risk resilient player in the fast growing consumer loans market.

http://www.bancoprimus.pt/crédito-responsável.aspx
interests: Banking and financial services, Competition, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, General and Institutional Affairs, Taxation
euInitiatives:
i. Corporate Governance
ii. Risk Management
iii. Data Privacy
iv. PSD2
iii. Anti-Money Laundering
iv. Electronic Identification and Remote KYC Processes
